document.full_text: citigroup inc  is planning to add 200 u.s. branches over the next three years and may expand into seattle and atlanta, bloomberg news reported on its website on friday.
document.title: citi plans to add 200 new u.s. branches: report
lines_and_colors: citigroup inc  is planning to add 200 u.s. branches over the next three years and may expand into seattle and atlanta, bloomberg news reported on its website on friday.
